ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Mean mean nasty Maestro
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Actually, for Dojorn sitting should be ok.  The only thing the caster needs to be sure of is that they ve scrolled off the agro list when he sits down.
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 11 Apr 2000, Reeves, Patrick W wrote:

> Heh, Two words John "NO SITTING" :) The ping pong thing is a major pain in
> the arse. We did Dojorn last night, failed on the first attempt due to
> pingponging (he was at a silver when the last tank fell). We got him on the
> second attempt. I just love those cheating NPCs though, dual-wielding Lore
> items, geeez :) We are doing Hate tonight, I am hoping that they replaced
> all the Clerics of Inny with Scorn Banshies :)
>

Actually, for Dojorn sitting should be ok. The only thing the
caster needs to be sure of is that they've scrolled off the agro list when
he sits down. When my guild killed Dojorn last time, I simply cons'd it
until it was indifferent again then sat down out of the AE rain spell's
range. It only stayed agro on me for a couple of seconds after I cast a
heal. And as for pure casters, they can't hit Dojorn anyways, so they
shouldn't even be casting.

--
Miriana
Legions of Darkness
Innoruuk Server
